overview: Courtney joined Demand Media after 5 years at Yahoo/Overture, including 2 years as Senior Director of the domain name and registrar business where she was responsible for managing over $300m of paid search revenues. Courtney helped to develop product and strategy around the direct navigation business. She also managed the advertising sales and marketing team of Oveture/Yahoo. Courtney previously held sales and management positions at AllAdvantage.com and eBillboards. Courtney holds a Bachelor of Arts degree from the University of California Santa Barbara in Business Economics.
